appearance.face: Square-jawed with defined cheekbones, light stubble, and a strong brow. Clear blue eyes with a focused, analytical gaze.
appearance.hair: Short sandy brown hair, neatly styled with a slight side part
appearance.expression: Confident but approachable smile, with slight laugh lines around the eyes
appearance.distinguishing: Wire-rimmed glasses that complement his academic appearance

appearance.face: Striking features with warm brown eyes and high cheekbones. Natural elegance with a Mediterranean glow.
appearance.hair: Long dark brown hair with subtle waves, often worn professionally styled
appearance.expression: Confident, engaging smile that lights up her whole face
appearance.distinguishing: Beauty mark above left side of lip
